alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Shelby; St. Clair; Tuscaloosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 04 at 12:16PM CDT until August 04 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of central Alabama, including the following counties, Bibb, Blount, Etowah, Fayette, Jefferson, Lamar, Marion, Shelby, St. Clair, Tuscaloosa, Walker and Winston. * WHEN...Until 4 PM CDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Area creeks and streams are running high and could flood with more heavy rain. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Another round of showers and storms will move across the watch area this afternoon, and may result in isolated flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
